Posts.Content: It all depends where the cancer is and how big sometimes they want to shrink it first and then remove it. I removed one of my breasts .,had chemo and radiation . doing well.
Posts.Title: Any one on Hormonal Therapy

Posts.Content: Hi my aunt has breast cancer and spread to the lungs , she took arimidex for 2 yrs. and is now on tamoxifen and doing very well. all is good. I am taking femara and have hot flashes joint and hip pain and I am still taking it cause it is working after 8yrs remission. I am still here. lol
